intro_only_event_legend_battle/4901_1301:
Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! There’s something
you need to know.

We got news that a Legendary Pokémon suddenly
appeared in a certain area of Pasio.

What’s more, they say it has a frighteningly
intimidating air about it and attacks any sync pairs
that come close.

Where could it have come from? The Pokémon may
be on edge after coming to an unfamiliar place.
Be careful if you go near it!
